name: v1_sentiment
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sentiment_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: State-of-the-art text sentiment analysis. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/sentiment.
API description: Performs sentiment analysis on the provided block of text using the API Ninjas sentiment analysis service.

text.description: The input text for sentiment analysis, with a maximum length of 2000 characters.
